message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you an exclusive opportunity to acquire my product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,300,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for discussions.
I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is significantly higher than your initial offer reflects.  Let's meet in the middle - I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to pay $920,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.
